fields.value: H2 column density maps for large-scale Herschel filaments

dsDescriptionValue.value: H2 column density maps of the 9 most prominent filaments identified by Herschel Space Observatory. The maps are derived by pixel-by-pixel SED fitting of Herschel Hi-GAL images, with a resolution 28 arcsec. See Figure 2 in Wang et al. 2015MNRAS.450.4043W "Large-scale filaments associated with Milky Way spiral arms".

fields.value:
Paper highlighted in:
ESA Feature Article "Herschel's hunt for filaments in the Milky Way"
ESA Image Release "Threading the Milky Way"
